Level 1 Section "Begin"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
English sentences from German Sentence translations
There are 581 sentences listed.
#EnglishGerman
Level 1 Section "A"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
Level 2 Section "A ⮕ A"
Level 1     A     A_City     A_Father     A_Mother
A_Woman     An     Are
1/581
(English Sentence)		a boy and a dogein Junge und ein Hund. = a boy and a dog.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


boy ==
(der) Junge = (the) boy
Jungen = boy


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


dog ==
(ein/ der) Hund = (a/ the) dog
Hundes = dog
Hündin = dog
2/581
(English Sentence)		a cat a beareine Katze, ein Bär. = a cat, a bear.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


be ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
[seid = are/be/did]
[sein = (to be)]


bear ==
(ein/ der) Bär = (a/ the) bear
(der) Bären = (the) bear


cat ==
Kater = cat
(eine/ die) Katze = (a/ the) cat

eins = a

ist Ärztin = is a doctor

Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


church ==
(eine/ die) Kirche = (a/ the) Church


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


library ==
(eine/ die) Bibliothek = (a/ the) Library
Bücherei = library
Sammlung = library
Level 2 Section "A ⮕ A_City"
Level 1     A     A_City     A_Father     A_Mother
A_Woman     An     Are
6/581
(English Sentence)		a cityeine Stadt. = a city.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


city ==
(eine) Stadt = (a) city/town


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it
7/581
(English Sentence)		a city in germanyeine Stadt in Deutschland = A city in Germany.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


any ==
ein = a/one/any/an
eine = a/any/one/an


city ==
(eine) Stadt = (a) city/town


german ==
Deutsche = German


germany ==
Deutschland = Germany
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


many ==
Viele = many/lots/lots of

10/581
(English Sentence)		a fatherein Vater. = A father.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an

eins = a

Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

13/581
(English Sentence)		a man needs now a doctor
a man needs a doctor now		Ein Mann braucht jetzt einen Arzt! = A man needs now a doctor!/ (A man needs a doctor now!)


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


doctor ==
(einen/ der) Arzt = (a/ the) doctor
(die) Ärztin = (the) doctor
bin Arzt = am a doctor
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


need ==
brauche = (I) need


needs ==
braucht = (he) needs


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


now ==
Jetzt = Now
kann jetzt nicht. = can't right now.


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
14/581
(English Sentence)		a mothereine Mutter. = A mother.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


mother ==
Mama = mother
(eine) Mutter = (a) mother/mom


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

25/581

a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


all ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


end ==
Ende = conclude with/ends/end


ends ==
Ende = conclude with/ends/end


that ==
das = The/This/That/this one
Das ist = that is/ this is
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
es = it/it's/that
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


we ==
wir = we


well ==
bekannt wie ein bunter Hund = well known
gründlich = well
Gut = good/goods/well/fine/happy
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
wohl = well
Level 2 Section "A ⮕ An"
Level 1     A     A_City     A_Father     A_Mother
A_Woman     An     Are
26/581
(English Sentence)		an elephant a dog a catein Elefant, ein Hund, eine Katze. = an elephant, a dog, a cat.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a

ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher

Marcel = (name of a person)

Sari = (name of a person)

eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


cat ==
Kater = cat
(eine/ die) Katze = (a/ the) cat


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


dog ==
(ein/ der) Hund = (a/ the) dog
Hundes = dog
Hündin = dog


elephant ==
(ein/ der) Elefant = (an/ the) elephant
(ein/ Der) Elefanten = (an/ the) elephant

28/581
(English Sentence)		and it is not in my jacketUnd er ist nicht in meiner Jacke. = And it is not in my jacket.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


jacket ==
(Eine/ die) Jacke = (a/ the) jacket


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


not ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
nicht = not
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.

are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come

malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim

seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing

wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both

bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you

danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you

du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

Level 2 Section "B ⮕ Beer"
Level 1     Beer     Berlin     But
33/581
(English Sentence)		beer or waterBier oder Wasser ? = Beer or water ?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


be ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
[seid = are/be/did]
[sein = (to be)]


beer ==
Bier = beer


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


water ==
(ein/ das) Mineralwasser = (a/ the) mineral water
(das) Wasser = (the) water
Wassers = water

(English Sentence)		beer pleaseBier, bitte! = Beer, please!


a ==

bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an

eins = a

als = than/as if/sometimes
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


be ==

[seid = are/be/did]
[sein = (to be)]

bitte = please/ask/begging
freuen = please
gefallen = please/fallen/gone/liked

a ==

bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one

Marcel = (name of a person)

Sari = (name of a person)

[sein = (to be)]

Berliner = Berlin


great ==

prima = Great
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
spitze = Great

wunderbar = wonderful/great/fabulous


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor

kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's

bist du = are you

danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you

du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you

ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
Level 1 Section "C"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F

all ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


call ==
anrufen = call/phone/gotten


can ==
Darf = may/can
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

eins = a

ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor

verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

sonst = or

47/581
(English Sentence)		canada is bigKanada ist groß. = Canada is big.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


big ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
großer = big
großes = big


can ==
Darf = may/can
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know


canada ==
Kanada = Canada


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's

is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is

spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


wonderful ==
wunderbar = wonderful/great/fabulous

eure = your
ihr = her/you/your
Ihre = your
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job

and ==
und = and


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

freuen = please
gefallen = please/fallen/gone/liked

Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


tea ==
(der) Tee = (the) tea
Level 2 Section "C ⮕ Coffee"
Level 1     Can     Chin     Coffee
55/581
(English Sentence)		coffee pleaseKaffee, bitte! = Coffee, please!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


as ==
als = than/as if/sometimes
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


please ==
bitte = please/ask/begging
freuen = please
gefallen = please/fallen/gone/liked
Level 1 Section "D"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
Level 2 Section "D ⮕ Do"
Level 1     Do     Do_You     Do_You
56/581
(English Sentence)		do you always cookKochst du immer? = Do you always cook?


a ==

bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

always ==

schon immer = always
ständig = always


cook ==

koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
kochen = cook
Köchin = cook
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


ok ==
klar = OK
OK = OK


way ==
drüben = over there/(way)
weg = away/way/means
weit = far/way/wide


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

male = paint/draw/am painting
malst = paint/are painting/draw
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
malt ... an = paint

weg = away/way/means
weit = far/way/wide

he ==
braucht = (he) needs

sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by

i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

like ==
gern = (like)
mag = like/likes
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
Mögen Sie = Do you like
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


red ==
rote = red


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


you ==

Arbeiten Sie = do you work

Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
64/581
(English Sentence)		do you swimSchwimmst du? = Do you swim?


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


im ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


swim ==
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
schwimmen = swim
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
schwimmst durch = swim
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim


you ==

66/581
(English Sentence)		do you want to danceWillst du tanzen = Do you want to dance?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


dance ==
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do

Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


want ==
möchtest = (want)
Willst = do want/want to/want


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you

Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

go ==

geht's = it's going/does it go

i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

oder = or/right/isn't it

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


out ==

to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you

nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
mit = with/with her/with him
zu = too/with/for/to
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
zusammen mit = with

(English Sentence)		do you work hereArbeiten Sie hier? = Do you work here?


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


work ==
Arbeit = work/job/jobs
arbeite = (I) work
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
geht auf = walks on/ work
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you

dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you

man = you

seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

(English Sentence)		does the dog swim oftenSchwimmt der Hund oft? = Does the dog swim often?

does ==
geht's = it's going/does it go
Was = what/what's/something/what does


dog ==
(ein/ der) Hund = (a/ the) dog
Hundes = dog
Hündin = dog


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course

vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


often ==
häufig = often
oft = often


swim ==
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
schwimmen = swim
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
schwimmst durch = swim
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
Level 1 Section "E"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
Level 2 Section "E ⮕ Eddy"
Level 1     Eddy     Every     Excuse
70/581
(English Sentence)		eddy and junior are at homeEddy und Junior sind zu Hause. = Eddy and Junior are at home.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


home ==
zu Hause = at home


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or
71/581
(English Sentence)		eddy is at the supermarketEddy ist im Supermarkt. = Eddy is at the supermarket.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student

at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


market ==
Absatzmarkt = market
(der) Markt = (the) Market
Marktplatz = market
vermarkten = market


super ==
Super = great/brilliant/excellent/super


supermarket ==
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
(der) Supermarkt = (the) Supermarket


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
72/581
(English Sentence)		eddy is not a doctorEddy ist kein Arzt. = Eddy is not a doctor.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


doctor ==
(einen/ der) Arzt = (a/ the) doctor
(die) Ärztin = (the) doctor
bin Arzt = am a doctor
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


not ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
nicht = not
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
73/581
(English Sentence)		eddy is sitting in front of the tvEddy sitzt vor dem Fernseher. = Eddy is sitting in front of the TV.


front ==
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is

sind = are/is/there are/did

spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is

it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


sitting ==
sitzt = is sitting


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his

habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


old ==
alt = old
ehemalige = old
ehemaliger = old
Schnee von gestern = old news


tea ==
(der) Tee = (the) tea


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
79/581
(English Sentence)		excuse me where is the marketEntschuldigung, wo ist der Markt? = Excuse me, where is the market?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


excuse ==

Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay

Level 2 Section "E ⮕ Excuse"
Level 1     Eddy     Every     Excuse

geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

waiter ==
Bedienung = waiter
(der) Kellner = (the) waiter/waiters


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where
Level 1 Section "F"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
Level 2 Section "F ⮕ Fast"
Level 1     Fast
84/581
(English Sentence)		fast the man is very sickSchnell! Der Mann ist sehr krank! = Fast! The man is very sick!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


as ==
als = than/as if/sometimes
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


sick ==
krank = sick


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


very ==
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
sehr = very/really/much
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
total = very
überaus = very
wirklich = very/Really

are ==

bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing

ausgehen = go out
gehe = (go)
geht's = it's going/does it go
verderben = spoil/go bad

in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you

danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

Sari = (name of a person)


day ==
noch = one day/still/ever
Tag = day


excuse ==
Entschuldigt = excuse
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me


go ==
ausgehen = go out
gehe = (go)
geht's = it's going/does it go
verderben = spoil/go bad


good ==
brav = good
brave = good
Gut = good/goods/well/fine/happy
Guten = Good
guten Tag = hello/good afternoon
haltbar = good
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim

dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you

seid ihr = are you

vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or

100/581
(English Sentence)		good morning motherGuten Morgen, Mutter! = Good morning, Mother!


go ==
ausgehen = go out
gehe = (go)
geht's = it's going/does it go
verderben = spoil/go bad


good ==
brav = good
brave = good
Gut = good/goods/well/fine/happy
Guten = Good
guten Tag = hello/good afternoon
haltbar = good
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


morning ==
Morgen = morning/tomorrow/mornings


mother ==
Mama = mother
(eine) Mutter = (a) mother/mom


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
Level 2 Section "G ⮕ Good_Thanks

102/581
(English Sentence)		great cheersSuper! Prost! = Great! Cheers!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


cheer ==
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer


cheers ==
Prost = Cheers


great ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
prima = Great
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
spitze = Great
Super = great/brilliant/excellent/super
wunderbar = wonderful/great/fabulous


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks
103/581
(English Sentence)		great i need helpSuper! Ich brauche Hilfe! = Great! I need help!

wohl = well
Level 1 Section "H"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
Level 2 Section "H ⮕ Haha"
Level 1     Haha     He     Hello     Hello_I     Hello_Marcel

is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student

sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


professor ==
ist Professorin = is a Professor
(Der) Professor = (the) professor
(die) Professorin = (the) professor


she ==
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her

Level 2 Section "H ⮕ He"
Level 1     Haha     He     Hello     Hello_I     Hello_Marcel
Hes
111/581
(English Sentence)		he is known all over townEr ist bekannt wie ein bunter Hund. = He is known all over town.


a ==

bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

i ==

brauche = (I) need

ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


know ==
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen = know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met


known ==
bekannt = known/well-known
bekannt wie ein bunter Hund = well known


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


now ==
Jetzt = Now
kann jetzt nicht. = can't right now.


over ==
aus = over
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
endet = is over


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


town ==
(eine) Stadt = (a) city/town
112/581
(English Sentence)		he runs to herEr läuft zu ihr. = He runs to her.


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


runs ==
läuft = runs


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

einem = a/an

eins = a

ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor

118/581
(English Sentence)		hello coffee pleaseHallo! Kaffee, bitte! = Hello! Coffee, please!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

ist Lehrerin = is a teacher

kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not

(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


as ==
als = than/as if/sometimes
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


hello ==
guten Tag = hello/good afternoon
Hallo = Hello


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


please ==
bitte = please/ask/begging
freuen = please
gefallen = please/fallen/gone/liked
119/581
(English Sentence)		hello excuse me are you a doctorHallo! Entschuldigung, sind Sie Ärztin? = Hello! Excuse me, are you a doctor?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


doctor ==
(einen/ der) Arzt = (a/ the) doctor
(die) Ärztin = (the) doctor
bin Arzt = am a doctor
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor


excuse ==
Entschuldigt = excuse
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


hello ==
guten Tag = hello/good afternoon
Hallo = Hello


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


hello ==
guten Tag = hello/good afternoon
Hallo = Hello


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
