123/581
(English Sentence)		hello lilli hows it goingHallo, Lilli! Wie geht's? = Hello, Lilli! How's it going?


go ==
ausgehen = go out
gehe = (go)
geht's = it's going/does it go
verderben = spoil/go bad


going ==
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht's = it's going/does it go


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


hello ==
guten Tag = hello/good afternoon
Hallo = Hello


how ==
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


ill ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich nehme = I'll take
nehme = (i'll) take


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it

Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
125/581
(English Sentence)		hello lilli whats upHallo, Lilli! Wie steht's? = Hello, Lilli! What's up?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

Hallo = Hello


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


ill ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich nehme = I'll take
nehme = (i'll) take


what ==
Was = what/what's/something/what does
was für = what
Was ist = What is/ What's
welchen = what
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


whats ==
Was = what/what's/something/what does
Was ist = What is/ What's
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both

a ==

Marcel = (name of a person)

are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


from ==
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
aus Frankreich = from France
stamme aus = from
vom = from/from the/of
vor = from
woher = where ... from/where/from


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


hello ==
guten Tag = hello/good afternoon
Hallo = Hello


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student

kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


mine ==
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to


mineral ==
(ein/ das) Mineralwasser = (a/ the) mineral water


water ==
(ein/ das) Mineralwasser = (a/ the) mineral water
(das) Wasser = (the) water
Wassers = water

Level 2 Section "H ⮕ Hes"

Hes
131/581
(English Sentence)		hes over there where the milk is
hes over there where is the milk		Er ist da drüben! Wo die Milch ist! = He's over there where the milk is!/ (He's over there! Where is the milk!)


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


hes ==
Er = It/He/he's/him


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


milk ==
(die) Milch = (the) milk


over ==
aus = over
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
endet = is over


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


there ==
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort = there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
sind = are/is/there are/did


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where

rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
133/581
(English Sentence)		his name is marcelEr heißt Marcel. = His name is Marcel.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


his ==
den = the/to the/his
Er heißt = his name is
heißt = (his) name is
Sein = his
seine = his


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


name ==
Er heißt = his name is
Gustav = (name of a person)
heißt = (his) name is
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)
134/581
(English Sentence)		how are youwie geht's? = how are you?

wie geht's dir = how are you?

wie geht's euch = how are you?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student

ist Ärztin = is a doctor

Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


how ==
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
Level 1 Section "I"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
Level 2 Section "I ⮕ I"
Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It
135/581
(English Sentence)		i always play chessIch spiele immer Schach. = I always play chess.


a ==

he ==

spricht = (he) speaks


hes ==

arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need

spielst Klavier = play the piano

spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielte = play


way ==
drüben = over there/(way)
weg = away/way/means
weit = far/way/wide

141/581
(English Sentence)		i am a teacherIch bin Lehrer. = I am a teacher.

Ich bin Lehrerin. = I am a teacher.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


tea ==
(der) Tee = (the) tea


teacher ==
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
(eine) Lehrerin = (a) teacher/schoolteacher

Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It

bist du = are you

danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you

du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

Marcel = (name of a person)

Sari = (name of a person)


am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


rich ==
reich = rich


very ==
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
sehr = very/really/much
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
total = very
überaus = very
wirklich = very/Really

162/581
(English Sentence)		i go now in the department storeIch gehe jetzt in das Kaufhaus! = I go now in the department store!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an

eins = a

ist Lehrerin = is a teacher

(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


department ==
(das) Kaufhaus = (the) Department Store


go ==
ausgehen = go out
gehe = (go)
geht's = it's going/does it go
verderben = spoil/go bad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


now ==
Jetzt = Now
kann jetzt nicht. = can't right now.


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


store ==
(das) Kaufhaus = (the) Department Store


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
163/581
(English Sentence)		i have fallen in love with youIch hab mich in dich verliebt. = I have fallen in love with you.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


all ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it


fall ==
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love


fallen ==
gefallen = please/fallen/gone/liked
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love


have ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
habe = (I) have
[haben = (to have)]
[wäre = would/have/would have]


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


love ==
liebe = love/kind/likeable
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love


with ==
Ende = conclude with/ends/end
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
mit = with/with her/with him
zu = too/with/for/to
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
zusammen mit = with


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
164/581
(English Sentence)		i like youIch mag dich. = I like you.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay

like ==

mag = like/likes

Mögen Sie = Do you like
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both

(English Sentence)		i often play the pianoIch spiele oft Klavier. = I often play the piano.

an ==

eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you

mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


often ==
häufig = often
oft = often


piano ==
(das) Klavier = (the) piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano


play ==
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
mache = play
spiele = play/playing/am playing
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spielen = play
spielst = play/are playing
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielte = play


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


paint ==
male = paint/draw/am painting
malst = paint/are painting/draw
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
malt ... an = paint


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

175/581
(English Sentence)		i paint sometimes
i sometimes paint		Ich male manchmal. = I paint sometimes./ I sometimes paint.


a ==

bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

177/581
(English Sentence)		i play the piano really wellIch spiele sehr gut Klavier. = I play the piano really well.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


all ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


piano ==
(das) Klavier = (the) piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano


play ==
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
mache = play
spiele = play/playing/am playing
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spielen = play
spielst = play/are playing
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielte = play


really ==
sehr = very/really/much
wirklich = very/Really
wirklich sehr = really


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


we ==
wir = we


well ==
bekannt wie ein bunter Hund = well known
gründlich = well
Gut = good/goods/well/fine/happy
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
wohl = well

i ==

like ==
gern = (like)
mag = like/likes
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
Mögen Sie = Do you like
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


paint ==
male = paint/draw/am painting
malst = paint/are painting/draw
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
malt ... an = paint


really ==
sehr = very/really/much
wirklich = very/Really
wirklich sehr = really


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
Level 2 Section "I ⮕ I_Swim"
Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It
180/581
(English Sentence)		i swimIch schwimme. = I swim.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


im ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


swim ==
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
schwimmen = swim
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
schwimmst durch = swim
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim

Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


all ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


im ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


really ==
sehr = very/really/much
wirklich = very/Really
wirklich sehr = really


swim ==
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
schwimmen = swim
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
schwimmst durch = swim
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim


we ==
wir = we


well ==
bekannt wie ein bunter Hund = well known
gründlich = well
Gut = good/goods/well/fine/happy
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
wohl = well

rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]

zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her

191/581
(English Sentence)		im sorry i dont work hereEs tut mir leid. Ich arbeite nicht hier. = I'm sorry. I don't work here.


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


dont ==
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


im ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


sorry ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
leid = sorry
tut mir leid = sorry


work ==
Arbeit = work/job/jobs
arbeite = (I) work
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
geht auf = walks on/ work
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
192/581
(English Sentence)		im sorry
i am sorry		es tut mir leid. = I'm sorry/ I am sorry


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


im ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


sorry ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
leid = sorry
tut mir leid = sorry

brauche = (I) need

habe = (I) have

meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay

mich = me/I/myself

Viele = many/lots/lots of
Level 2 Section "I ⮕ In"
Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It

braucht = (he) needs

i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany

rein = in

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


taxi ==
(das) Taxi = (the) Taxi
(Der) Taxistand = (the) taxi stand


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


small ==
klein = small/little/smallest
kleinen = small
kleiner = small

an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


big ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
großer = big
großes = big


can ==
Darf = may/can
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know


canada ==
Kanada = Canada


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's

a ==

bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is

Level 2 Section "I ⮕ Is_He"
Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It
205/581
(English Sentence)		is he a waiterIst er Kellner? = Is he a waiter?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a

ist Ärztin = is a doctor

Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding

spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


waiter ==
Bedienung = waiter
(der) Kellner = (the) waiter/waiters
206/581

is
did it		ist es = is it like/ is/ did it


did ==

sind = are/is/there are/did

208/581
(English Sentence)		is the atm on the leftIst der Geldautomat links? = Is the ATM on the left?


a ==

at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


atm ==
(der) Geldautomat = (the) ATM/cash machine/cashpoint
Geldautomaten = ATM


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


left ==
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
209/581
(English Sentence)		is the bakery on the rightIst die Bäckerei rechts? = Is the bakery on the right?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one

Sari = (name of a person)


bakery ==
Bäcker = bakery
(die) Bäckerei = (the) Bakery


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are

ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student

sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


right ==
der richtige = right
die richtige = right
kann jetzt nicht. = can't right now.
oder = or/right/isn't it
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
Level 2 Section "I ⮕ Is_The"
Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It
210/581
(English Sentence)		is the church nearbyIst die Kirche in der Nähe? = Is the church nearby?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


by ==
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
mit dem Bus = by bus


church ==
(eine/ die) Kirche = (a/ the) Church


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


near ==
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nahe = (near)


nearby ==
in der Nachbarschaft = nearby
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nahe gelegen = nearby


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
211/581
(English Sentence)		is the coffee deliciousIst der Kaffee lecker? = Is the coffee delicious?


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


delicious ==
köstlich = delicious
lecker = delicious/tasty
leckere = delicious


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
212/581
(English Sentence)		is the coffee hotIst der Kaffee heiß? = Is the coffee hot?


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


hot ==
heiß = hot


i ==

brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work

Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving

endet = is over

geht = is/going/is going/are

geht es in = is

ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is

Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of

auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his

(English Sentence)		is the coffee shop cheapIst das Café billig? = Is the coffee shop cheap?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

eins = a

(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


cheap ==
billig = cheap/inexpensive


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks

meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving

endet = is over

214/581
(English Sentence)		is the hotel old or newIst das Hotel alt oder neu? = Is the hotel old or new?


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


hot ==
heiß = hot


hotel ==
(das) Hotel = (the) hotel


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


new ==
neu = new
neue = new
neuer = new
neuesten = new
New York = New York


old ==
alt = old
ehemalige = old
ehemaliger = old
Schnee von gestern = old news


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
Level 2 Section "I ⮕ Is_The"
Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It
215/581
(English Sentence)		is the park beautifulIst der Park schön? = Is the park beautiful?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


be ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
[seid = are/be/did]
[sein = (to be)]


beautiful ==
großartig = beautiful
schön = beautiful/handsome/lovely/nice/pretty
schöne = nice/beautiful
schönes = beautiful
wunderschön = beautiful


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


if ==
als = than/as if/sometimes


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


park ==
(ein/ der) Park = (a/ the) park
parke = park
parkt = park


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
216/581
(English Sentence)		is the pharmacy nearbyIst die Apotheke in der Nähe? = Is the pharmacy nearby?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor

(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


by ==
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
mit dem Bus = by bus


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


near ==
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nahe = (near)


nearby ==
in der Nachbarschaft = nearby
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nahe gelegen = nearby


pharmacy ==
(die) Apotheke = (the) Pharmacy


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
217/581
(English Sentence)		is the pizza deliciousIst die Pizza lecker? = Is the pizza delicious?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


delicious ==
köstlich = delicious
lecker = delicious/tasty
leckere = delicious


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


pizza ==
(die) Pizza = (the) pizza

auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one

den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

vermarkten = market


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


right ==
der richtige = right
die richtige = right
kann jetzt nicht. = can't right now.
oder = or/right/isn't it
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


super ==
Super = great/brilliant/excellent/super


supermarket ==
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
(der) Supermarkt = (the) Supermarket

an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one

den = the/to the/his

Level 2 Section "I ⮕ Is_The"
Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It
220/581
(English Sentence)		is the train station far awayIst der Bahnhof weit weg? = Is the train station far away.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


aw ==
Oh = oh/aw


away ==
weg = away/way/means
weit weg = far away


far ==
weit = far/way/wide
weit weg = far away


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is

auf der = on the

geht auf = walks on/ work

linken = on the left

rechts = on the right/right/to the right


station ==
(Der) Bahnhof = (the) train station/station
Station = station
stellst = station
(die) U-Bahnstation = (the) subway station/tube station/metro station


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

linken = on the left

vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


train ==
(Der) Bahnhof = (the) train station/station
bilden aus = train
trainiere = train
Zug = train


way ==
drüben = over there/(way)
weg = away/way/means
weit = far/way/wide
221/581
(English Sentence)		is the train station over thereIst der Bahnhof da drüben? = Is the train station over there?

her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love

is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
