on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


over ==
aus = over
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
endet = is over


station ==
(Der) Bahnhof = (the) train station/station
Station = station
stellst = station
(die) U-Bahnstation = (the) subway station/tube station/metro station


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


there ==
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort = there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
sind = are/is/there are/did


train ==
(Der) Bahnhof = (the) train station/station
bilden aus = train
trainiere = train
Zug = train
222/581
(English Sentence)		is the university bigIst die Universität groß? = Is the university big?


big ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
großer = big
großes = big


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


university ==
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
(eine/ die) Universität = (a/ the) university
223/581
(English Sentence)		is vienna in austriaIst Wien in Österreich? = Is Vienna in Austria?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


austria ==
Österreich = Austria


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


vienna ==
Wien = Vienna
224/581
(English Sentence)		is your father an actorIst dein Vater Schauspieler? = Is your father an actor?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student

eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)

ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher

ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


actor ==
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


our ==
unserer = our


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you


your ==
Dein = Your/Yours
deine = your/yours/of you
deine Frau = your wife
deinen = your
deiner = your
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
Du = You/You're/your
eure = your
ihr = her/you/your
Ihre = your
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
Level 2 Section "I ⮕ Is_Your"
Level 1     I     I_Am     I_Am     I_Am     I_Come
I_Cook     I_Love     I_Never     I_Paint     I_Swim
I_Think     Im     In     Is     Is_He     Is_The
Is_The     Is_The     Is_Your     It

(English Sentence)		is your wife a professorIst deine Frau Professorin? = Is your wife a professor?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


if ==
als = than/as if/sometimes


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


our ==
unserer = our


professor ==
ist Professorin = is a Professor
(Der) Professor = (the) professor
(die) Professorin = (the) professor


wife ==
deine Frau = your wife
Ehefrau = wife
(Eine/Einer/ die) Frau = (a/ the) wife/woman/Mrs.
meine Frau = my wife


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you


your ==
Dein = Your/Yours
deine = your/yours/of you
deine Frau = your wife
deinen = your
deiner = your
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
Du = You/You're/your
eure = your
ihr = her/you/your
Ihre = your
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job

the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
235/581
(English Sentence)		lilli in our school there is a new studentLilli, in unserer Schule ist ein neuer Schüler! = Lilli, in our school there is a new student!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


ill ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich nehme = I'll take
nehme = (i'll) take


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


new ==
neu = new
neue = new
neuer = new
neuesten = new
New York = New York


our ==
unserer = our


school ==
in die Schule = to school
(die) Schule = (the) school


student ==
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
(Der) Schüler = (the) student
Student = college student
Studentin = college student


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


there ==
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort = there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
sind = are/is/there are/did
Level 1 Section "M"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End

of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it

aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)

sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


our ==
unserer = our


profession ==
Beruf = profession/job/occupation


what ==
Was = what/what's/something/what does
was für = what
Was ist = What is/ What's
welchen = what
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you

danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you

du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you

man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

ihr = her/you/your

oder = or/right/isn't it

to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

(English Sentence)		me hmmIch, hmm ... = Me, hmm ...

242/581
(English Sentence)		milk and coffee pleaseMilch und Kaffee, bitte! = Milk and coffee, please!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a

Marcel = (name of a person)

Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an

and ==
und = and


as ==
als = than/as if/sometimes
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


milk ==
(die) Milch = (the) milk


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


please ==
bitte = please/ask/begging
freuen = please
gefallen = please/fallen/gone/liked
243/581
(English Sentence)		milk or waterMilch oder Wasser ? = Milk or water ?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


milk ==
(die) Milch = (the) milk


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


water ==
(ein/ das) Mineralwasser = (a/ the) mineral water
(das) Wasser = (the) water
Wassers = water

i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

habe = (I) have

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


munich ==
München = Munich


pen ==
(die) Feder = (the) pen/feather/tongues

brother ==

he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

251/581
(English Sentence)		my brother is a doctorMein Bruder ist Arzt. = My brother is a doctor.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an

eins = a

ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher

kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


brother ==
Bruder = brother/brother's


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


doctor ==
(einen/ der) Arzt = (a/ the) doctor
(die) Ärztin = (the) doctor
bin Arzt = am a doctor
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need

habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay

heißt = (his) name is

meiner = I/my

mir (...) den = my


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
252/581
(English Sentence)		my brother is a professor and my sister is a professorMein Bruder ist Professor und meine Schwester ist Professorin. = My brother is a professor and my sister is a professor.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


brother ==
Bruder = brother/brother's


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


professor ==
ist Professorin = is a Professor
(Der) Professor = (the) professor
(die) Professorin = (the) professor


sister ==
Schwester = sister


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

(English Sentence)		my brother is very niceMein Bruder ist sehr nett. = My brother is very nice.

spricht = (he) speaks

mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her

arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

mich = me/I/myself

bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving

endet = is over

the ==

auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one

Level 2 Section "M ⮕ My_Brother"
Level 1     Marcel     Me     Munich     My     My_Brother
My_Daughter     My_Father     My_Father     My_Friend
My_Mother     My_Mother     My_Shirt     My_Sister
My_Son     My_Wife

(English Sentence)		my brother sometimes plays the pianoMein Bruder spielt manchmal Klavier. = My brother sometimes plays the piano.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

an ==

eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an

im ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


met ==
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


piano ==
(das) Klavier = (the) piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano


play ==
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
mache = play
spiele = play/playing/am playing
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spielen = play
spielst = play/are playing
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielte = play


plays ==
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
Stücke = plays
Stücken = plays


sometimes ==
als = than/as if/sometimes
mal = sometimes/times/time
manchmal = sometimes


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


time ==
mal = sometimes/times/time


times ==
mal = sometimes/times/time
259/581
(English Sentence)		my cat is beautifulMeine Katze ist schön. = My cat is beautiful.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


be ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
[seid = are/be/did]
[sein = (to be)]


beautiful ==
großartig = beautiful
schön = beautiful/handsome/lovely/nice/pretty
schöne = nice/beautiful
schönes = beautiful
wunderschön = beautiful


cat ==
Kater = cat
(eine/ die) Katze = (a/ the) cat


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


if ==
als = than/as if/sometimes


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my

mir (...) den = my


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


son ==
Sohn = son
Sohnes = son


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
268/581
(English Sentence)		my father cooksMein Vater kocht. = My father cooks.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


cook ==
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
kochen = cook
Köchin = cook
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook


cooks ==
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


ok ==
klar = OK
OK = OK


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
269/581
(English Sentence)		my father is a teacherMein Vater ist Lehrer. = My father is a teacher.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


tea ==
(der) Tee = (the) tea


teacher ==
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
(eine) Lehrerin = (a) teacher/schoolteacher


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

also ==
auch = also/too/even/either
außerdem = also


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


doctor ==
(einen/ der) Arzt = (a/ the) doctor
(die) Ärztin = (the) doctor
bin Arzt = am a doctor
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there

ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor

ist Professorin = is a Professor

sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's

mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
Level 2 Section "M ⮕ My_Father"
Level 1     Marcel     Me     Munich     My     My_Brother
My_Daughter     My_Father     My_Father     My_Friend
My_Mother     My_Mother     My_Shirt     My_Sister
My_Son     My_Wife

(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


all ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


nice ==
freundlich = nice
lieb = nice
nett = nice/kind/pretty/kindly
schön = beautiful/handsome/lovely/nice/pretty
schöne = nice/beautiful
sympathisch = nice


tall ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
hoch = tall
höhere = tall
lang = tall
langen = tall


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

Level 2 Section "M ⮕ My_Friend"
Level 1     Marcel     Me     Munich     My     My_Brother

is ==

bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding

of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


professor ==
ist Professorin = is a Professor
(Der) Professor = (the) professor
(die) Professorin = (the) professor

ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


smart ==
klug = smart/clever/wise
kluger = smart
kluges = smart
schlau = smart
Level 2 Section "M ⮕ My_Mother"
Level 1     Marcel     Me     Munich     My     My_Brother
My_Daughter     My_Father     My_Father     My_Friend
My_Mother     My_Mother     My_Shirt     My_Sister
My_Son     My_Wife
281/581
(English Sentence)		my mother and my sistermeine Mutter und meine Schwester. = My mother and my sister.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


mother ==
Mama = mother
(eine) Mutter = (a) mother/mom


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


sister ==
Schwester = sister


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
282/581
(English Sentence)		my mother cooks really wellMeine Mutter kocht sehr gut. = My mother cooks really well.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)

Alles = all/all in/all of it


cook ==
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
kochen = cook
Köchin = cook
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook


cooks ==
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her

(eine) Mutter = (a) mother/mom

mein = my

meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


ok ==
klar = OK
OK = OK


really ==
sehr = very/really/much
wirklich = very/Really
wirklich sehr = really


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left

vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


we ==
wir = we


well ==
bekannt wie ein bunter Hund = well known
gründlich = well
Gut = good/goods/well/fine/happy
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
wohl = well

in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


very ==
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
sehr = very/really/much
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
total = very
überaus = very
wirklich = very/Really
287/581
(English Sentence)		my mother my daughtermeine Mutter, meine Tochter. = My mother, my daughter.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


daughter ==
Tochter = daughter


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


mother ==
Mama = mother
(eine) Mutter = (a) mother/mom


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
288/581
(English Sentence)		my mother never plays the pianoMeine Mutter spielt nie Klavier. = My mother never plays the piano.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


ever ==
noch = one day/still/ever


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


mother ==
Mama = mother
(eine) Mutter = (a) mother/mom


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


never ==
nie = never
niemals = never
noch nie = never


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


piano ==
(das) Klavier = (the) piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano


play ==
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
mache = play
spiele = play/playing/am playing
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spielen = play
spielst = play/are playing
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielte = play


plays ==
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
Stücke = plays
Stücken = plays


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
289/581
(English Sentence)		my mother swimsMeine Mutter schwimmt. = My mother swims.


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


im ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


mother ==
Mama = mother
(eine) Mutter = (a) mother/mom


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


swim ==
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
schwimmen = swim
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
schwimmst durch = swim
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim


swims ==
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

290/581
(English Sentence)		my passport is not hereMein Pass ist nicht hier! = My passport is not here!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


as ==
als = than/as if/sometimes
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


not ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
nicht = not
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


passport ==
(Der) Pass = (the) passport
Level 2 Section "M ⮕ My_Shirt"
Level 1     Marcel     Me     Munich     My     My_Brother
My_Daughter     My_Father     My_Father     My_Friend
My_Mother     My_Mother     My_Shirt     My_Sister
My_Son     My_Wife

an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
295/581
(English Sentence)		my sister and my husbandmeine Schwester und mein Mann. = My sister and my husband.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


husband ==
Ehemann = husband
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


sister ==
Schwester = sister

Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have

mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are

geht es in = is

300/581
(English Sentence)		my sister swims oftenMeine Schwester schwimmt oft. = My sister swims often.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


im ==
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are

sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


often ==
häufig = often
oft = often


sister ==
Schwester = sister


swim ==
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
schwimmen = swim
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
schwimmst durch = swim
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim


swims ==
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
