ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


tall ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
hoch = tall
höhere = tall
lang = tall
langen = tall


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
399/581
(English Sentence)		the boy is youngDer Junge ist jung. = The boy is young.


boy ==
(der) Junge = (the) boy
Jungen = boy


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you


young ==
jugendlich = young
jung = young
jungen = young

[sein = (to be)]

The_Woman
405/581
(English Sentence)		the church is over thereDie Kirche ist da drüben. = The church is over there.


church ==
(eine/ die) Kirche = (a/ the) Church


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


over ==
aus = over
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
endet = is over


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


there ==
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort = there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
sind = are/is/there are/did
406/581
(English Sentence)		the coffee is on meDer Kaffee geht auf mich. = The coffee is on me.


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
407/581
(English Sentence)		the coffee is too hotDer Kaffee ist zu heiß! = The coffee is too hot.


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


hot ==
heiß = hot


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you

Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


too ==
auch = also/too/even/either
zu = too/with/for/to

(English Sentence)		the coffee shop is too expensiveDas Café ist zu teuer. = The coffee shop is too expensive.

expensive ==

409/581
(English Sentence)		the dog and the catder Hund und die Katze = the dog and the cat


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


cat ==
Kater = cat
(eine/ die) Katze = (a/ the) cat


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


dog ==
(ein/ der) Hund = (a/ the) dog
Hundes = dog
Hündin = dog


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

The_Woman
410/581
(English Sentence)		the dog is beautifulDer Hund ist schön. = The dog is beautiful.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


be ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
[seid = are/be/did]
[sein = (to be)]


beautiful ==
großartig = beautiful
schön = beautiful/handsome/lovely/nice/pretty
schöne = nice/beautiful
schönes = beautiful
wunderschön = beautiful


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you

Willst = do want/want to/want

das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you


young ==
jugendlich = young
jung = young
jungen = young
412/581
(English Sentence)		the dog the owlder Hund, die Eule = the dog, the owl


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


dog ==
(ein/ der) Hund = (a/ the) dog
Hundes = dog
Hündin = dog


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


owl ==
(die) Eule = (the) Owl


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

rechts = on the right/right/to the right

spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
413/581
(English Sentence)		the egg is deliciousDas Ei ist lecker. = The egg is delicious.


delicious ==
köstlich = delicious
lecker = delicious/tasty
leckere = delicious


egg ==
(ein) Ei = (an) egg


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)

ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor

Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)

be ==

bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
[seid = are/be/did]
[sein = (to be)]


beautiful ==
großartig = beautiful
schön = beautiful/handsome/lovely/nice/pretty
schöne = nice/beautiful
schönes = beautiful
wunderschön = beautiful

of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


shop ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café


the ==

auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the

he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


library ==
(eine/ die) Bibliothek = (a/ the) Library
Bücherei = library
Sammlung = library


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


very ==
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
sehr = very/really/much
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
total = very
überaus = very
wirklich = very/Really
Level 2 Section "T ⮕ The_Library"
Level 1     Tad     Thank     Thank_You     The
The_Black     The_Cat     The_Church     The_Dog
The_Food     The_Library     The_Man     The_Mineral
The_Museum     The_Owl     The_Pharmacy     The_Sandwich
The_Soccer     The_Supermarket     The_Tea     The_Woman
The_Woman
420/581
(English Sentence)		the library the churchDie Bibliothek, die Kirche. = The library, the church.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


church ==
(eine/ die) Kirche = (a/ the) Church


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


library ==
(eine/ die) Bibliothek = (a/ the) Library
Bücherei = library
Sammlung = library


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
421/581
(English Sentence)		the man is a studentDer Mann ist Student. = The man is a student.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


student ==
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
(Der) Schüler = (the) student
Student = college student
Studentin = college student


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
422/581
(English Sentence)		the man is an actorDer Mann ist Schauspieler. = The man is an actor.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


actor ==
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
423/581
(English Sentence)		the man is my fatherDer Mann ist mein Vater. = The man is my father.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

man ==

nice ==
freundlich = nice
lieb = nice
nett = nice/kind/pretty/kindly
schön = beautiful/handsome/lovely/nice/pretty
schöne = nice/beautiful
sympathisch = nice


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his

is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


smart ==
klug = smart/clever/wise
kluger = smart
kluges = smart
schlau = smart


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
426/581
(English Sentence)		the man is very tallDer Mann ist sehr groß. = The man is very tall.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


all ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


tall ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
hoch = tall
höhere = tall
lang = tall
langen = tall


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


very ==
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
sehr = very/really/much
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
total = very
überaus = very
wirklich = very/Really

(der) Markt = (the) Market
Marktplatz = market
vermarkten = market


stand ==
ertragen = stand
ertragt = stand
helft aus = stand
liegt = stand
(Der) Taxistand = (the) taxi stand


taxi ==
(das) Taxi = (the) Taxi
(Der) Taxistand = (the) taxi stand


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


market ==
Absatzmarkt = market
(der) Markt = (the) Market
Marktplatz = market
vermarkten = market


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


station ==
(Der) Bahnhof = (the) train station/station
Station = station
stellst = station
(die) U-Bahnstation = (the) subway station/tube station/metro station


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

bilden aus = train
trainiere = train
Zug = train
429/581
(English Sentence)		the market is over thereDer Markt ist da drüben. = The market is over there.


a ==

sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is

spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


market ==
Absatzmarkt = market
(der) Markt = (the) Market
Marktplatz = market
vermarkten = market


over ==
aus = over
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
endet = is over


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


there ==
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort = there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
sind = are/is/there are/did

The_Woman
430/581
(English Sentence)		the mineral water is deliciousDas Mineralwasser ist lecker. = The mineral water is delicious.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

zu Hause = at home

köstlich = delicious

leckere = delicious

mineral ==

the ==

auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

(das) Wasser = (the) water
Wassers = water

spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


water ==
(ein/ das) Mineralwasser = (a/ the) mineral water
(das) Wasser = (the) water
Wassers = water

(English Sentence)		the mineral water the waterdas Mineralwasser, das Wasser. = the mineral water, the water.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


museum ==
(das) Museum = (the) museum

das = The/This/That/this one

440/581
(English Sentence)		the owl the catdie Eule, die Katze. = the owl, the cat.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


cat ==
Kater = cat
(eine/ die) Katze = (a/ the) cat


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


owl ==
(die) Eule = (the) Owl


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


market ==
Absatzmarkt = market
(der) Markt = (the) Market
Marktplatz = market
vermarkten = market


park ==
(ein/ der) Park = (a/ the) park
parke = park
parkt = park


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your

im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

linken = on the left

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

442/581
(English Sentence)		the park is on the leftDer Park ist links. = The park is on the left.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


left ==
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


park ==
(ein/ der) Park = (a/ the) park
parke = park
parkt = park


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your

im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase

ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving

endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is

findet = finds/find/is finding

spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is

over ==
aus = over
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
endet = is over


park ==
(ein/ der) Park = (a/ the) park
parke = park
parkt = park

auf der = on the

sind = are/is/there are/did

in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay

linken = on the left

station ==

stellst = station

auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one

den = the/to the/his

447/581
(English Sentence)		the restaurant is heredas Restaurant ist hier. = The restaurant is here.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


restaurant ==
(das) Restaurant = (the) restaurant


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

he ==

sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


salad ==

the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your

rechts = on the right/right/to the right

vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

Level 2 Section "T ⮕ The_Sandwich"

The_Woman
450/581
(English Sentence)		the sandwich is deliciousDas Sandwich ist lecker. = The sandwich is delicious.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

451/581
(English Sentence)		the sandwich is great thank youDas Sandwich ist super, danke! = The sandwich is great, thank you!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


great ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
prima = Great
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
spitze = Great
Super = great/brilliant/excellent/super
wunderbar = wonderful/great/fabulous


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


sandwich ==
belegte Brot = sandwich
belegtes Brot = sandwich
(ein/ das) Sandwich = (a/ the) sandwich


than ==
als = than/as if/sometimes


thank ==
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
dankt = Thank


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

the ==

auf der = on the

das = The/This/That/this one

den = the/to the/his

in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the
454/581
(English Sentence)		the schnitzel is deliciousdas Schnitzel ist lecker. = The Schnitzel is delicious.


delicious ==
köstlich = delicious
lecker = delicious/tasty
leckere = delicious


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


schnitzel ==
(das) Schnitzel = (the) schnitzel
(das) schnitzels = (the) schnitzel


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

The_Woman
455/581
(English Sentence)		the soccer game is greatDas Fußballspiel ist super! = The soccer game is great!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


game ==
(Das) Fußballspiel = (the) soccer game


great ==
groß = tall/large/great/big
prima = Great
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
spitze = Great
Super = great/brilliant/excellent/super
wunderbar = wonderful/great/fabulous


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work

in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get

linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

stellst = station

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

drüben = over there/(way)
weg = away/way/means
weit = far/way/wide

460/581
(English Sentence)		the supermarket is also nearbyDer Supermarkt ist auch in der Nähe. = The supermarket is also nearby.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


also ==
auch = also/too/even/either
außerdem = also


by ==
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
mit dem Bus = by bus


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


market ==
Absatzmarkt = market
(der) Markt = (the) Market
Marktplatz = market
vermarkten = market


near ==
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nahe = (near)


nearby ==
in der Nachbarschaft = nearby
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nahe gelegen = nearby


super ==
Super = great/brilliant/excellent/super


supermarket ==
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
(der) Supermarkt = (the) Supermarket


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

466/581
(English Sentence)		the train station is also on the rightDer Bahnhof ist auch rechts. = The train station is also on the right.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


also ==
auch = also/too/even/either
außerdem = also


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


right ==
der richtige = right
die richtige = right
kann jetzt nicht. = can't right now.
oder = or/right/isn't it
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


station ==
(Der) Bahnhof = (the) train station/station
Station = station
stellst = station
(die) U-Bahnstation = (the) subway station/tube station/metro station


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

Level 2 Section "T ⮕ The_Woman"
