The_Woman
470/581
(English Sentence)		the woman is a doctorDie Frau ist Ärztin. = The woman is a doctor.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


doctor ==
(einen/ der) Arzt = (a/ the) doctor
(die) Ärztin = (the) doctor
bin Arzt = am a doctor
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are

geht es in = is

sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


woman ==
(Eine/Einer/ die) Frau = (a/ the) wife/woman/Mrs.
471/581
(English Sentence)		the woman is a studentDie Frau ist Studentin. = The woman is a student.


a ==

Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


student ==
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
(Der) Schüler = (the) student
Student = college student
Studentin = college student


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


woman ==
(Eine/Einer/ die) Frau = (a/ the) wife/woman/Mrs.

The_Woman
475/581
(English Sentence)		the woman is smartDie Frau ist klug. = The woman is smart.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

very ==

sehr = very/really/much
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
total = very
überaus = very
wirklich = very/Really


woman ==
(Eine/Einer/ die) Frau = (a/ the) wife/woman/Mrs.
477/581
(English Sentence)		the woman the mandie Frau, der Mann = the woman, the man

spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


woman ==
(Eine/Einer/ die) Frau = (a/ the) wife/woman/Mrs.
478/581
(English Sentence)		to the taxi standzum Taxistand = to the taxi stand.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


stand ==
ertragen = stand
ertragt = stand
helft aus = stand
liegt = stand
(Der) Taxistand = (the) taxi stand


taxi ==
(das) Taxi = (the) Taxi
(Der) Taxistand = (the) taxi stand


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

too ==
auch = also/too/even/either
zu = too/with/for/to
Level 1 Section "V"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
Level 2 Section "V ⮕ Very"
Level 1     Very     Vikram

man = you

seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering

fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride

geht es = are

spielst = play/are playing

zu Hause = at home

Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see

heißt = (his) name is

seine = his


i ==

brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry

habe = (I) have

is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

Was ist = What is/ What's


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


store ==
(das) Kaufhaus = (the) Department Store


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


woman ==
(Eine/Einer/ die) Frau = (a/ the) wife/woman/Mrs.
Level 2 Section "V ⮕ Vikram"
Level 1     Very     Vikram
485/581
(English Sentence)		vikram noVikram, nein! = Vikram, no!


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

einem = a/an

Marcel = (name of a person)

am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no

Level 1 Section "W"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F

Level 2 Section "W ⮕ Water"
Level 1     Water     What     What_Is     Where
Where_Is     Where_Is     Wine

(English Sentence)		water and bread pleaseWasser und Brot, bitte! = Water and bread, please!

492/581
(English Sentence)		what is it like in berlinWie ist es in Berlin? = What is it like in Berlin?

im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

zu Hause = at home


be ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
[seid = are/be/did]
[sein = (to be)]


berlin ==
Berlin = Berlin
Berliner = Berlin


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


like ==
gern = (like)
mag = like/likes
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
Mögen Sie = Do you like
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


what ==
Was = what/what's/something/what does
was für = what
Was ist = What is/ What's
welchen = what
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both

im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


chicago ==
Chicago = Chicago


go ==
ausgehen = go out
gehe = (go)
geht's = it's going/does it go
verderben = spoil/go bad


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


like ==
gern = (like)
mag = like/likes
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
Mögen Sie = Do you like
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


what ==
Was = what/what's/something/what does
was für = what
Was ist = What is/ What's
welchen = what
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both

of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


our ==
unserer = our


profession ==
Beruf = profession/job/occupation


what ==
Was = what/what's/something/what does
was für = what
Was ist = What is/ What's
welchen = what
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you


your ==
Dein = Your/Yours
deine = your/yours/of you
deine Frau = your wife
deinen = your
deiner = your
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
Du = You/You're/your
eure = your
ihr = her/you/your
Ihre = your
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job

a ==

are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
501/581
(English Sentence)		where are you fromWo kommst du her? = Where are you from?

Woher kommen Sie = Where are you from?

Woher kommst du? = Where are you from?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


from ==
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
aus Frankreich = from France
stamme aus = from
vom = from/from the/of
vor = from
woher = where ... from/where/from


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
Level 2 Section "W ⮕ Where"
Level 1     Water     What     What_Is     Where
Where_Is     Where_Is     Wine
502/581
(English Sentence)		where do you come from karlWoher kommst du, Karl? = Where do you come from, Karl?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


come ==
[gekommen = come/arrived/passed]
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
kommst = are/are coming/come
kommt = come/comes/is
stehen = come


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


from ==
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
aus Frankreich = from France
stamme aus = from
vom = from/from the/of
vor = from
woher = where ... from/where/from


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

(English Sentence)		where is austriaWo ist Österreich? = Where is Austria?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


austria ==
Österreich = Austria


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where

506/581
(English Sentence)		where is the cash register pleaseWo ist die Kasse, bitte? = Where is the cash register please?


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student

(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


as ==
als = than/as if/sometimes
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


cash ==
(der) Geldautomat = (the) ATM/cash machine/cashpoint
(die) Kasse = (the) cash register


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her

da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is

sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


please ==
bitte = please/ask/begging
freuen = please
gefallen = please/fallen/gone/liked


register ==
(die) Kasse = (the) cash register


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where
Level 2 Section "W ⮕ Where_Is"
Level 1     Water     What     What_Is     Where
Where_Is     Where_Is     Wine
507/581
(English Sentence)		where is the dogWo ist der Hund? = Where is the dog?


do ==

du = do you

tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


dog ==
(ein/ der) Hund = (a/ the) dog
Hundes = dog
Hündin = dog


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==

mit = with/with her/with him

spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where
508/581
(English Sentence)		where is the foodWo ist das Essen? = Where is the food?


food ==
(das) Essen = (the) food/meal/eating


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me

dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his

rechts = on the right/right/to the right

Level 1     Water     What     What_Is     Where
Where_Is     Where_Is     Wine

a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)

Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)

spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


schnitzel ==
(das) Schnitzel = (the) schnitzel
(das) schnitzels = (the) schnitzel


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who

ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


market ==
Absatzmarkt = market
(der) Markt = (the) Market
Marktplatz = market
vermarkten = market


super ==
Super = great/brilliant/excellent/super


supermarket ==
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
(der) Supermarkt = (the) Supermarket


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


where ==
Wo = Where/anywhere
woher = where ... from/where/from
wohin = where

linken = on the left

rechts = on the right/right/to the right

Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)

Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

bitte = please/ask/begging
freuen = please
gefallen = please/fallen/gone/liked

Wein = wine

Level 1 Section "Y"
Begin     A     B     C     D     E     F
G     H     I     J     K     L     M
N     O     P     R     S     T     V
W     Y     End
Level 2 Section "Y ⮕ Yes"
Level 1     Yes     Yes_I     Yes_My     Yes_Paris
Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_You     You
You_Are     You_Look     You_Play
522/581
(English Sentence)		yesJa! = Yes!


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes
523/581
(English Sentence)		yes i am a doctorJa, ich bin Arzt. = Yes, I am a doctor.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not

Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


do ==
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
du = do you
hast du = do you
machen = to do
machen Ihre Arbeit = do your job
Mögen Sie = Do you like
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
Sie = do you
tun = do
tut = puts/do
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
Willst = do want/want to/want


doctor ==
(einen/ der) Arzt = (a/ the) doctor
(die) Ärztin = (the) doctor
bin Arzt = am a doctor
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


to ==
Auf = on to/for/upon
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dir = you/of you/to you
hab = (to) have/haves/credits
[haben = (to have)]
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in die Schule = to school
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know
kennen lernen = get to know/ meet/ met
laut = loud/loudly/according to
lernen = learn to
links = on the left/left/to the left
machen = to do
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mit = to/with/among
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
nächste = next/next to
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
[schlachten = (to slaughter)/(to butcher)]
[sein = (to be)]
Willst = do want/want to/want
zu = too/with/for/to
zu ihr = to her
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes
524/581
(English Sentence)		yes i am a teacherJa, ich bin Lehrerin. = Yes, I am a teacher.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


am ==
bin = am/have been/have/will be
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
male = paint/draw/am painting
schwimme = swim/swimming/am swimming
spiele = play/playing/am playing
Uhr morgens = am
wird = am


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


tea ==
(der) Tee = (the) tea


teacher ==
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
(eine) Lehrerin = (a) teacher/schoolteacher


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes

rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV

malst = paint/are painting/draw
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint

wirklich sehr = really

wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
wohl = well

Ja = Yes

Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you

du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
Level 2 Section "Y ⮕ Yes_I"
Level 1     Yes     Yes_I     Yes_My     Yes_Paris
Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_You     You
You_Are     You_Look     You_Play

531/581
(English Sentence)		yes mother you are niceJa, Mutter, du bist nett. = Yes, mother, you are nice.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


mother ==
Mama = mother
(eine) Mutter = (a) mother/mom


nice ==
freundlich = nice
lieb = nice
nett = nice/kind/pretty/kindly
schön = beautiful/handsome/lovely/nice/pretty
schöne = nice/beautiful
sympathisch = nice


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
Level 2 Section "Y ⮕ Yes_My"
Level 1     Yes     Yes_I     Yes_My     Yes_Paris
Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_You     You
You_Are     You_Look     You_Play
532/581
(English Sentence)		yes my work is exciting but very stressfulJa, meine Arbeit ist aufregend, aber sehr stressig. = Yes, my work is exciting, but very stressful.


but ==
Aber = but/however
jedoch = but
sondern = but


exciting ==
aufregend = exciting
erregen = exciting
spannend = exciting


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


in ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
rein = in
verliebt = fallen in love/fall in love
von = about/in
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


it ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
Er = It/He/he's/him
es = it/it's/that
geht's = it's going/does it go
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
oder = or/right/isn't it
steht's = that's it


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


stressful ==
anstrengend = stressful
anstrengenden = stressful
stressig = stressful


very ==
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
sehr = very/really/much
sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
total = very
überaus = very
wirklich = very/Really


work ==
Arbeit = work/job/jobs
arbeite = (I) work
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
geht auf = walks on/ work
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes
533/581
(English Sentence)		yes no problemJa, kein Problem! = Yes, no problem!


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


problem ==
Problem = problem


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes
534/581
(English Sentence)		yes of courseJa, natürlich = Yes, of course.


course ==
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Verlauf = course


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


our ==
unserer = our


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes
535/581
(English Sentence)		yes or noJa oder nein ? = Yes or no?


no ==
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
keine = no
keinerlei = no
Nein = no


or ==
oder = or/right/isn't it
sonst = or


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes
536/581
(English Sentence)		yes over there come onJa! Da drüben! Komm! = Yes! Over there! Come on!


come ==
[gekommen = come/arrived/passed]
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
kommst = are/are coming/come
kommt = come/comes/is
stehen = come


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


on ==
an der = on the
Auf = on to/for/upon
auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


over ==
aus = over
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
endet = is over


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.

linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


there ==
da = there/over there/because/here
da drüben = over there
dort = there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
sind = are/is/there are/did


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes

ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


cheap ==
billig = cheap/inexpensive


coffee ==
(das) Café = (the) coffee shop/café
(der) Kaffee = (the) coffee


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


here ==
da = there/over there/because/here
her = here
hier = here/this/these here/this here it
hierhin = here
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nicht mehr hier. = not here anymore.


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


of ==
Alles = all/all in/all of it
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
deine = your/yours/of you
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Gustav = (name of a person)
haha = sound of laughter
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
Korn = grain [of corn]/seed/grain
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Natürlich = of course/naturally/natural
Sari = (name of a person)
selbstvërstandlich = of course
sicher = of course
Viele = many/lots/lots of
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes

an der = on the

auf der = on the
bis = See you/See you on/Until
geht auf = walks on/ work
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
in = in/with/inside/into/to/on/get
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right


right ==
der richtige = right
die richtige = right
kann jetzt nicht. = can't right now.
oder = or/right/isn't it
rechts = on the right/right/to the right

yes ==

Ja = Yes
Level 2 Section "Y ⮕ Yes_The"
Level 1     Yes     Yes_I     Yes_My     Yes_Paris
Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_You     You
You_Are     You_Look     You_Play

finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding

geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


museum ==
(das) Museum = (the) museum


near ==
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nahe = (near)


nearby ==
in der Nachbarschaft = nearby
in der Nähe = nearby/ near/ around here/ close by
nahe gelegen = nearby


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes
549/581
(English Sentence)		yes the owl is smart and niceJa, die Eule ist klug und nett. = Yes, the owl is smart and nice.

ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over

finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding

yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes
Level 2 Section "Y ⮕ Yes_The"
Level 1     Yes     Yes_I     Yes_My     Yes_Paris
Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_You     You
You_Are     You_Look     You_Play

vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the

da drüben = over there
dort = there
dort drüben = over there
drüben = over there/(way)
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
sind = are/is/there are/did

554/581

are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


daughter ==
Tochter = daughter


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
555/581
(English Sentence)		yes you are my fatherJa, du bist mein Vater. = Yes, you are my father.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


yes ==
Doch = yes
Ja = Yes


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

an ==

eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


and ==
und = and


are ==
bestellen = order/cultivate/are ordering
bist = are/being/will be/have been/did
bist du = are you
fahren = (they) are riding/(they) ride
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are

Level 2 Section "Y ⮕ Yes_You"
Level 1     Yes     Yes_I     Yes_My     Yes_Paris
Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_You     You
You_Are     You_Look     You_Play

geht = is/going/is going/are
geht es = are
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
kannst = can/are able to/know
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kommst = are/are coming/come
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
malst = paint/are painting/draw
schwimmst = swim/are swimming/are floating/do swim
seid = are
[seid = are/be/did]
seid ihr = are you
sind = are/is/there are/did
sind Sie = are you
spielst = play/are playing
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


at ==
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
machen Ihre Arbeit sehr gut = are very good at your job
zu Hause = at home


father ==
(ein) Vater = (a) father/dad


he ==
braucht = (he) needs
Er = It/He/he's/him
sieht = (he) sees/see
spricht = (he) speaks


her ==
ihr = her/you/your
mit = with/with her/with him
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
zu ihr = to her


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


the ==
an der = on the
auf der = on the
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
das = The/This/That/this one
dem = the/(to the)
den = the/to the/his
Der = The/This/That/to the/of the/who
Die = The/This/That/that's/this one/who/your
im = at the
im Flughafen = at the airport
im Supermarkt. = at the supermarket.
in der = on the
linken = on the left
links = on the left/left/to the left
rechts = on the right/right/to the right
spiele Klavier = play the piano
spiele ... Klavier = play the piano
spielst Klavier = play the piano
spielt Klavier = play the piano
spielt ... Klavier = plays the piano
vom = from/from the/of
vor dem Fernseher = in front of the TV
zum = to the/that/the/to/with the


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you

(English Sentence)		you are my motherDu bist meine Mutter. = You are my mother.


a ==

bin Lehrerin = am a teacher

einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a

ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not

Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)

Sari = (name of a person)

i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


is ==
befindet = is
bringt = is delivering/is bringing/is retrieving
Das ist = that is/ this is
endet = is over
Er heißt = his name is
finde = think ... is/find
findet = finds/find/is finding
geht = is/going/is going/are
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
geht es in = is
heißt = (his) name is
ist = is/am/has been/did/was/has/there is/is there
ist am = is
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook
kommt = come/comes/is
malt = paints/is painting/is drawing/paint
schwimmt = swims/swimming/is swimming/swim
sind = are/is/there are/did
sitzt = is sitting
spielt = plays/playing/is playing/play
steht = is
Was ist = What is/ What's


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


sister ==
Schwester = sister

Level 2 Section "Y ⮕ You_Are"
Level 1     Yes     Yes_I     Yes_My     Yes_Paris
Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_The     Yes_You     You
You_Are     You_Look     You_Play

Kann = can/can speak/am able to/am able to play
kannst = can/are able to/know


dance ==
tanzen = dance/dancing/are dancing


we ==
wir = we


well ==
bekannt wie ein bunter Hund = well known
gründlich = well

sehr gut = very well/ very good/ great
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both
wohl = well

570/581
(English Sentence)		you come from germanyDu kommst aus Deutschland. = You come from Germany.


a ==
bin Arzt = am a doctor
bin Lehrerin = am a teacher
bin ... Student = am a college student/ am a student/ am a university student
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
einen = a
eins = a
Gustav = (name of a person)
ist Arzt = is a doctor
ist Ärztin = is a doctor
ist Lehrerin = is a teacher
ist Professorin = is a Professor
ist Student = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
ist Studentin = is a college student/ is a student/ is a university student
kein = no/don't/not a/nobody/no one/not
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
(ein) Lehrer = (a) a teacher/teacher/teachers
Lilli = (name of a person)
Marcel = (name of a person)
Maria = (name of a person)
Sari = (name of a person)


an ==
ein = a/an/one
eine = a/any/one/an
einem = a/an
Schauspieler = (an) actor/actors/players


any ==
ein = a/one/any/an
eine = a/any/one/an


come ==
[gekommen = come/arrived/passed]
komme = come/will come/coming/am coming
kommst = are/are coming/come
kommt = come/comes/is
stehen = come


from ==
aus = from/(relaxing)/made of/in/out/out of/of
aus dem = out of the/ from/ from the
aus Frankreich = from France
stamme aus = from
vom = from/from the/of
vor = from
woher = where ... from/where/from


german ==
Deutsche = German


germany ==
Deutschland = Germany
Deutschlands = Germany/in Germany


man ==
(Ein/ Der) Mann = (a/ the) husband/man
Mannes = husband/man


many ==
Viele = many/lots/lots of


me ==
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
Entschuldigung Sie = excuse me
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
Danke = Thanks/Thank/thank you/cheer
danke schön = thank you
deine = your/yours/of you
dich = you/of you/yourselves
dir = you/of you/to you
Du = You/You're/your
du = do you
euch = you
hast du = do you
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
ihr = her/you/your
man = you
Mögen Sie = Do you like
seid ihr = are you
Sie = you/she/they/you're/her
sind Sie = are you
571/581
(English Sentence)		you cookDu kochst. = You cook.


cook ==
Köche = Cooks (plural of a Cook)
koche = cook/will cook/am cooking
kochen = cook
Köchin = cook
kochst = cook/cooking/are cooking
kocht = cooks/is cooking/cook


ok ==
klar = OK
OK = OK

572/581
(English Sentence)		you look like my next girlfriendDu siehst aus wie meine nächste Freundin. = You look like my next girlfriend.


end ==
Ende = conclude with/ends/end


friend ==
Freundin = friend/girlfriend


girl ==
[(das) Mädchen = (the) girl]


girlfriend ==
Freundin = friend/girlfriend


i ==
arbeite = (I) work
brauche = (I) need
Entschuldigung = excuse me/sorry/I am sorry
geht auf mich = is on me/ I will pay
habe = (I) have
Halt = (I) hold/(I) am holding/purchase
Ich = I/I'm/I'll/me
Ich arbeite nicht = I don't work
ich bin = I was/ I will be/ I'm/ I am
Ich finde dich = I think you are/ I find you
meiner = I/my
mich = me/I/myself
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me


like ==
gern = (like)
mag = like/likes
möchte = would like to/would like/like
Mögen = to like
Mögen Sie = Do you like
wie = How/How do/What's/What ... like/What/like/as/as well as/both


look ==
siehst = look


my ==
mein = my
meine = my/mean/mine/think/refer to
meine Frau = my wife
meiner = I/my
mir = I/me/my/myself/to me/for me
mir (...) den = my


next ==
nächste = next/next to


ok ==
klar = OK
OK = OK


you ==
Arbeiten = (you) work
Arbeiten Sie = do you work
Auf Wiedersehen = Bye/Goodbye/See you
bis = See you/See you on/Until
bist du = are you
